abstract: With its best ratings of the season, “Criminal Minds” lifted CBS into first place on Wednesday. The 9 p.m. crime show delivered 15.7 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates, while eking out a victory as the night’s top rated show among adults 18 to 49.

lead_paragraph: With its best ratings of the season, “Criminal Minds” lifted CBS into first place on Wednesday. The 9 p.m. crime show delivered 15.7 million viewers, according to Nielsen’s estimates, while eking out a victory as the night’s top rated show among adults 18 to 49.
